alert.note: Alert for Howard; Mitchell (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 09 at 8:22PM CDT until May 10 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CDT FOR EASTERN MITCHELL...HOWARD...SOUTHEASTERN MOWER AND SOUTHWESTERN FILLMORE COUNTIES... At 822 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lime Springs, or 12 miles west of Cresco, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Cresco around 835 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Forestville State Park, Vernon Springs, York, Hutton, Brownville, County Roads T 54 And A 31 and Highways 9 And 218. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for southeastern Minnesota. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
